title: What are some K pop lyrics that you actually misheard? - Quora

response.answer_text: BTS MIc Drop Let me smack that a** Actually it’s Don’t you see my bags As if it’s your last by Blackpink So tonight won’t you set me free Actually it’s Seotun nal won’t you set me free Boombayah: Blackpink choiule and brunette gegaa choiule ha Actually it’s 좋아, 이 분위기가 좋아 Another misunderstood lyric: middle finger, Afro cannie Actaully it’s middle finger up, FU, pay me Blackpink Whistle: Just listen to my heart Actaually it’s Just whistle to my heart BTS Fake Love: I’m so sorry I’m in fake love, fake uh love fake our love Me: Wut? I'm so sick of this fake love, fake love, fake love Another misunderstood lyric: I wanna be a boomer, just for you Actually it’s I wanna be a good man just for you Another misunderstood lyric: Now I’m a numer, who are you Actually it’s Now I don't know me, who are you? Blackpink Kill this love Look at me, look at you Actually it’s Lucky me, lucky you Boy with Luv BTS Have fun in may Actually it’s how's your day Another misunderstood lyric: I’m sexy Actually it’s Oh text me Boy in Luv BTS tegoppa no your moopa no sa a neat tae a goppa Actaully it’s : 会いたいんだ 愛したいんだ Special: Twice I know that I’m a pretzel (Me: i can’t believe I thought that!!!!) Actually it’s you make me feel special Dun Dun EVERGLOW: So you a na a na a na a na ma! Actually it’s So, you had better run Say my name Ateez: Shro you know don’t you say my name Actually it’s 조금 더 크게 say my name Red Velvet: Ice Cream cake I’m so tasty come on tastE me! Actually it’s: It's so tasty, come and chase me Suga’s interlude shadow I got a big trim, ya ohh Actually it’s I got a big dream yeah ooh BTS Blood sweat and tears Now big da aint my and my’s cha mine jimen cha get your cute, cute Actually it’s 내 피 땀 눈물내 마지막 춤을 Sorry that’s everything!!!:) Here is an edit: Blue Orgnade By txt (It’s gonna be funny:): at 1:23 the rap goes you like 2pac I like biggie biggie But i listened to the audio first and I hadn’t watched the lyric video I thought i went you like to gag on that baby b*tch (I actually want to kick myself in the butt for thinking dirty in an innocent song) Me now:  Also in Euphoria, i didn’t know that Kookie was saying Euphoria I thought he was saying who you are or something i was thinking

1. ‘Black Or White’ - Dreamcatcher  What I thought that Dami said: “Mmm, I’m gonna fuck up all the light, okay, okay.” But she was really saying: “Amugeona seokkeo beorillae, okay, okay.” I know, it sounds like a bit of a stretch but listen to it first. 2. ‘Wannabe’ - Itzy  When I first heard Ryujin’s introduction, I thought she said: “Jansorineun so bad” but she actually said: “Stop it,” and then at their dance break I heard: “Turn this feet up.” instead of “Turn this beat up.” 3. ‘Oh My God’ - (G)I-DLE  I hear Soyeon go: “Hate me, hate me” instead of “Help me, help me”. It’s still very similar so I don’t consider this a horrible fail. 4. ‘Me’ - CLC  About a week ago I realized that CLC was saying “areudaumi me yeah” instead of “me up”. I was extremely sad about this discovery. 5. ‘Picky Picky’ - Weki Meki  For Elly’s verse, I heard, “I don’t lie, I don’t lie” but she was actually saying: “I don’t like, I don’t want”. And of course, “Dig a wall like fire”. ~flav.r
